full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA'I THUGS RTEN 'DZUGS TSUL CHO GA STOBS CHEN DON GNYIS LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,(CES DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA'I THUGS RTEN 'DZUGS TSUL 'DI NI THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO MDZAD PA'I CHOS SKYONG @016B SO SO'I THUGS RTEN DANG, RDO RJE 'CHANG BLO BZANG SHES RAB DPAL BZANG POS MDZAD PA'I RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG KHROS PA'I THUGS RTEN 'DZUGS TSUL DANG RIGS MTHUN BYAS PA 'DI NI, SMAN RAMS PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BRTZON 'GRUS DANG, DGE BSHED GSOL DPON SLOB BU DGE SLOB BLO BZANG RDO RJE GNYIS GAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^RGYAL DBANG THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I BKA' LUNG GIS DZA YA PAndI TA ZHES 'BOD PA'I BLO BZANG 'JIGS MED RDO RJES SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SDOM BRTZON RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'O, ,'DI LA BRTEN NAS RGYAS PA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
